sentences.en: A cat lived in the greatest friendship with a young sparrow.
sentences.cn: 小猫与小麻雀十分和睦地一起生活.

sentences.en: A sparrow alighted on the branch.
sentences.cn: 一只麻雀飞落在树枝上.

sentences.en: A sparrow is very alert in its movement.
A sparrow is very alert in its movements.
A sparrow may be small but it has all the vital organs.
Appearing in great danger, the tiny sparrow tumbled on to the lawn, but softy Flint appeared to have taken pity on him.
sentences.cn: 跌落在草地上的小麻雀看起来处于非常危险的境地，但是温柔的“弗林特”似乎非常同情他。

sentences.en: I can see a sparrow two hundred paces away.
sentences.cn: 我看得见二百步以外的麻雀.

sentences.en: Mr Sparrow has acted with commendable speed.
sentences.cn: 斯帕罗先生行动之快值得赞扬。

sentences.en: Now it is clearing up, and a sparrow is beginning to chirp.
sentences.cn: 现在天就要晴了, 一只麻雀已开始喳喳地叫.

sentences.en: Only a solitary cracked-voiced reed-sparrow greeted her from the bushes by the river, in a sad, machine-made tone, resembling that of a past friend whose friendship she had outworn.
sentences.cn: 只有一只声音嘶哑的芦雀，在河边的树丛中用悲伤机械的音调向她打招呼，就像一个已经没有了友谊的从前的朋友向她打招呼的声音一样。

sentences.en: Some birds, such as the white - crowned sparrow, have only one song.
sentences.cn: 有些鸟, 例如白头雀, 只会唱一种歌曲.

sentences.en: The boy has got a hen sparrow.
The myrtle, dove, sparrow, and swan are sacred to her.
sentences.cn: 桃金娘，鸽子，麻雀和天鹅是她的圣物。

sentences.en: The sparrow crossed the lawn in a series of hops.
sentences.cn: 那麻雀一蹦一跳地穿过草坪.

sentences.en: The sparrow perked up its tail.
The sparrow whizzed up into a tree.
sentences.cn: 麻雀噌的一声飞上了树.

sentences.en: We repeated this experiment in a number of song sparrow territories.
sentences.cn: 我们在一些歌雀的领地重复了这种实验.

sentences.en: With a flap of its wings the sparrow flew off.

trans.tran_en: a small brown bird, very common in many parts of the world
